item.title: EXEtoMSI
item.description: Clone the Git Repository GitHub Repository 1git clone dghdfjkghjk Change directorties to the repository you just cloned 1cd C:\Users\User\Documents\GitHub\EXEtoMSI Environment Setup Create a Conda environment 1conda create --name EXEtoMSI python=2.7 Import requirements 1pip install -r requirements.txt List all installed packages to confirm WiX.py is installed successfully 1conda list -n EXEtoMSI Prepare your template Replace PUT-GUID-HERE with a GUID that's been randomly generated: 1powershell -Command "[guid]::NewGuid().ToString()" Replace YOUR_APP_NAME with the name of your application, in this case EXEtoMSI 1<?
